price: Nokorε sε, Nyamefrε bea biara wͻ Nyankopͻn, enti monhwε na moannsu anfrε obiara (wͻ hͻ) ka Nyankopͻn nko ara ho.
arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدۡعُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-anna al-masājida lillahi falā tadʿū maʿa al-lahi aḥadan
